TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_u_liwan_sa_tatengaay_a_cabay, title = u_liwan_sa_tatengaay_a_cabay, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/u_liwan_sa_tatengaay_a_cabay} }

S.FORM: u liwan sa tatengaay a cabay.留下的是真朋友 nadikudan nu tuki , u liwan sa tatengaay a cabay. , nikaydaan sa , idaw ku cay kapawan , tanguul kiyami. . pakataealen ku duma nayi ku cacanan. . hatiniay tu atademaw , mahida nisepian hatidayu ku paini nu nababalaki .amana kahica hatini kunikaudip, taneng tu kasaetim tu paini nu babalaki ,hidanamin ku balucu' kiya tatengaay abalucu' tademaw tu tademaw , idaw aca ku likeluh balucu' tu balucu', idaw aca ku kasasukapah. . nikasasukaydih nayi ku mihca, widasa u balucu' masasulalid, cacya kubalucu, mabulah, nayay ku laad, nika alac nu bayu' mamuni' ku baetu. . Saka baluduhan sa, yu udadan maladay muculil, pasasuini tu balucu' masasuhelup tu adungu. Yadahay a masasu paini, cay pakasinum tu balicu' isu, tanayu'ay a nihalhal, cay pakahalhal tu dadatengan a tademaw. . Pakadateng tu kaydih, u nikaudipan a wayway; ukaydih cay kaw laway musakam acacay, maydih tu cacay a tatademawan, caykaw kinacacay a makakitin. , hayni ka udipan a makakitin, balucu' tu balucu'; kiya idaw ku balucu' pakadiheku tu balucu' kiya sibalucu' maduduc. . Sukaydih idaw ku cueded' akutii', upaini nu paudipay malaliwasak tu, masasudiheku kiya matenes , u kaydih idaw ku maibuk atu abesa, balucu' idaw ku pacebaay, masasu paini kiya idaw ku diheku. .

o liwan sa tatengaay a cabay.留下的是真朋友 nadikodan no toki , o liwan sa tatengaay a cabay. , nikaydaan sa , idaw ko cay kapawan , tangool kiyami. . pakataealen ko doma nayi ko cacanan. . hatiniay to atademaw , mahida nisepian hatidayo ko paini no nababalaki .amana kahica hatini konikaodip, taneng to kasaetim to paini no babalaki ,hidanamin ko baloco' kiya tatengaay abaloco' tademaw to tademaw , idaw aca ko likeloh baloco' to baloco', idaw aca ko kasasokapah. . nikasasokaydih nayi ko mihca, widasa o baloco' masasolalid, cacya kobaloco, mabolah, nayay ko laad, nika alac no bayo' mamoni' ko baeto. . Saka balodohan sa, yo odadan maladay mocolil, pasasoini to baloco' masasohelop to adongo. Yadahay a masaso paini, cay pakasinom to balico' iso, tanayo'ay a nihalhal, cay pakahalhal to dadatengan a tademaw. . Pakadateng to kaydih, o nikaodipan a wayway; okaydih cay kaw laway mosakam acacay, maydih to cacay a tatademawan, caykaw kinacacay a makakitin. , hayni ka odipan a makakitin, baloco' to baloco'; kiya idaw ko baloco' pakadiheko to baloco' kiya sibaloco' madodoc. . Sokaydih idaw ko coeded' akotii', opaini no paodipay malaliwasak to, masasodiheko kiya matenes , o kaydih idaw ko maibok ato abesa, baloco' idaw ko pacebaay, masaso paini kiya idaw ko diheko. .
